title: Gaming the system, but result is the same
summary: After last year’s Monaco Grand Prix was red-flagged on the opening lap following a three-car accident between Sergio Perez and the two Haas cars up the hill out of Ste…

qa_pairs.correct_answer: A three-car accident involving Sergio Perez and two Haas cars.
wrong_options: A tire failure on Charles Leclerc's car.
A collision between Lewis Hamilton and Max Verstappen.
Bad weather conditions leading to poor visibility.
